metadata.title: CVE-2024-54505 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: A type confusion issue was addressed with improved memory handling. Thisissue is fixed in iPadOS 17.7.3, watchOS 11.2, visionOS 2.2, tvOS 18.2,macOS Sequoia 15.2, Safari 18.2, iOS 18.2 and iPadOS 18.2. Processingmaliciously crafted web content may lead to memory corruption.

criterions.comment: webkit2gtk package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
qtwebkit-opensource-src: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
wpewebkit: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
